Package app

Class SNIDApp

java.lang.Object
app.SNIDApp
public class SNIDApp
extends java.lang.Object
The app for the SNID management. Interacts with the database and the TextUI and the SNIDGUI
See Also:
SNIDDb, SNIDGUI

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SNIDApp​(java.lang.String fileName, char delimiter)
    This constructor creates a SNIDDb object which fetches data from the specified file and builds a list of objects of type Citizen using data from the file

  • Constructor Details

    • SNIDApp

      public SNIDApp​(java.lang.String fileName, char delimiter) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.io.IOException, java.lang.Exception

      This constructor creates a SNIDDb object which fetches data from the specified file and builds a list of objects of type Citizen using data from the file

      Parameters:
      fileName - - Name of file
      delimiter - - character which separated data in the file
      Throws:
      java.security.InvalidParameterException - if the file contains incompatible biometric information. Biometric data must have a tag as specified in BiometricData
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the database file cannot be found/created
      java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong while reading from the database
      java.lang.Exception - if an unknown problem occurs, or an error while access a null object, or an invalid array index
      java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException - if the delimeter for the data is invalid
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - indicates that the file data has been corrupted or is invalid for one or more records

  • Method Details

    • registerDeath

      public void registerDeath​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String cause, java.lang.String place, java.lang.String date)
      Creates a death certificate for the deceased citizen and attaches it to their record. The life status of the citizen will also be set to dead on their record.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID number of the dead citizen
      cause - the cause of death
      place - the place of death
      date - the date of death
      Throws:
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionException - if registering the death of the citizen fails because the ID passes does not exist in the database or some other unknown reason.

    • registerMarriage

      public void registerMarriage​(java.lang.String groomId, java.lang.String brideId, java.lang.String date)
      Creates a marriage certifiacte for the newly weds and attaches the certificate to both their records.
      Parameters:
      groomId - the groom's ID number
      brideId - the bride's ID number
      date - the date of the marraige
      Throws:
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionException - if the marraige could not be registered because the bride and/or the groom's ID passed do not exist in the database or some other unknown reason.

    • mailingLabel

      public java.lang.String mailingLabel​(java.lang.String id)
      Formats the address of a specified ciizen (by ID) into a mailing Label
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the citizen whose address should be formatted into a mailing label
      Returns:
      the mailing label

    • getMother

      public java.lang.String getMother​(java.lang.String id)
      Gets the information of the mother of a particular citizen. Information is in the format 434552,Lisa,Anne,Rodney where 434552 is the mother's ID number, Lisa is her first name, Anne is her middle name, Rodney is her last name.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the citizen whose mother's information should be fetched
      Returns:
      A String with the mother's information if the citizen has a mother or and empty String if the citizen has no mother or the citizen's ID can't be found in the database

    • getFather

      public java.lang.String getFather​(java.lang.String id)
      Gets the information of the father of a particular citizen. Information is in the format 545669,Brian,Joseph,Charles where 545669 is the father's ID number, Brian is his first name, Joseph is his middle name, Charles is his last name.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the citizen whose father's information should be fetched
      Returns:
      A String with the father's information if the citizen has a father or and empty String if the citizen has no father or the citizen's ID can't be found in the database

    • search

      public java.lang.String search​(java.lang.String id)
      Searches the database by citizen ID and return's the citizen's information if the citizen is found Information is in the format 434552,Lisa,Anne,Rodney where 434552 is the ID number, Lisa is the first name, Anne is the middle name, Rodney is the last name.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the citizen to search for
      Returns:
      the citizen's information or and empty String

    • searchGUI

      public java.lang.String searchGUI​(java.lang.String id)
      Searches the database by citizen ID and return's the citizen's information formatted fo the GUI
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the citizen to search for
      Returns:
      the citizen's information or and empty String

    • search

      public java.lang.String[] search​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName)
      Searches the database by first and last name. A list of the information for all matches is compiled. Information is in the format 434552,Lisa,Anne,Rodney where 434552 is the ID number, Lisa is the first name, Anne is the middle name, Rodney is the last name.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the citizen(s) to be found.
      lastName - the last name of the citizen(s) to be found
      Returns:
      a list of the information for all matchesor an empty list
      Throws:
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionException - if something goes wrong during the search or compiling the list and it could not be completed

    • searchGUI

      public java.lang.String[] searchGUI​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName)
      Searches the database by first and last name. A list of the information for all matches is compiled for the GUI
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the citizen(s) to be found.
      lastName - the last name of the citizen(s) to be found
      Returns:
      a list of the information for all matchesor an empty list
      Throws:
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionException - if something goes wrong during the search or compiling the list and it could not be completed

    • search

      public java.lang.String search​(char tag, java.lang.String value)
      Searches for a citizen by their biometric data and returns their information. Information is in the format 434552,Lisa,Anne,Rodney where 434552 is the ID number, Lisa is the first name, Anne is the middle name, Rodney is the last name.
      Parameters:
      tag - the type of biometric data being used to search
      value - the biometric value
      Returns:
      the citzen's information if found or an empty String if not found
      Throws:
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionException - if something goes wrong while trying to search the database

    • searchGUI

      public java.lang.String searchGUI​(char tag, java.lang.String value)
      Searches for a citizen by their biometric data and returns their information for the GUI.
      Parameters:
      tag - the type of biometric data being used to search
      value - the biometric value
      Returns:
      the citzen's information if found or an empty String if not found
      Throws:
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionException - if something goes wrong while trying to search the database

    • registerBirth

      public void registerBirth​(char gender, int yob, java.lang.String fname, java.lang.String mname, java.lang.String lname)

      This method adds a new Citizen object to the system and generates an unique i.d for the object, attributes are set to default for the object and lifeStatus is set to 'A' for the object

      Parameters:
      gender - - character specifying the gender of citizen
      yob - - integer representing the year of birth
      fname - - String representing the first name of individuals
      mname - - String representing the middle name of individuals
      lname - - String representing the last name of individuals
      Throws:
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionException - if creating the new record or adding it to the database fails

    • addParentData

      public void addParentData​(java.lang.String updateID, java.lang.String fatherID, java.lang.String motherID) throws java.util.concurrent.CompletionException

      This method updates the reference locations for a Citizen object using a specified Id for the object to be updated and the Id of the parent objects

      Parameters:
      updateID - - ID for the object to be updated
      fatherID - - ID for the father object
      motherID - - ID for the mother object
      Throws:
      CompletionExeption - if the record for either parent(s) or child is not found
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionException

    • updateAddress

      public void updateAddress​(java.lang.String updateID, java.lang.String street, java.lang.String town, java.lang.String parish, java.lang.String country) throws java.util.concurrent.CompletionException

      This method updates the reference location for the address attribute of a Citizen object

      Parameters:
      updateID - - ID for the object to be updated
      street - - street line of Address
      town - - town line of Address
      parish - - parish line of Address
      country - - country line of Address
      Throws:
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionException

    • addBiometric

      public void addBiometric​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String data)
      Add biometric data to a citizen's record
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the citizen whose record the biometric data should be added to.
      data - the biometric data to be added
      Throws:
      java.security.InvalidParameterException - if the biometric data is in an incompatible format
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionException - if the data could not be added to the citizen's record, most likely because the citizen was not found

    • getBiometric

      public java.lang.String getBiometric​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String tag)
      Gets the value of a citizen's biometric data
      Parameters:
      id - The citizen's ID
      tag - the type of biometric data to get as specified in BiometricData
      Returns:
      the biometric value
      Throws:
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionException - if the biometric data could not be found or retreived or the citizen could not be found

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.io.IOException
      Shutsdown the program. All records are saved before termination.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file to be written to cannot be found/created
      java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong while trying to write the records to file
